LanguageData.Mizu_Dehydration.label: dehydration
LanguageData.Mizu_Dehydration.description: Extended duration without fresh water. Initial effects are mild, but prolonged lack of water can be life-threatening.
LanguageData.Mizu_Dehydration.stages.trivial.label: trivial
LanguageData.Mizu_Dehydration.stages.minor.label: minor
LanguageData.Mizu_Dehydration.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.Mizu_Dehydration.stages.severe.label: severe
LanguageData.Mizu_Dehydration.stages.extreme.label: extreme
LanguageData.Mizu_DrankSeaWater.label: drank sea water
LanguageData.Mizu_DrankSeaWater.description: Seawater contains too much salt, and drinking it can cause electrolyte imbalance and affects organs' ability to filter blood.
LanguageData.Mizu_IcecreamHeadache.label: Icecream headache
LanguageData.Mizu_IcecreamHeadache.description: Eating frozen things too fast can cause a nasty headache.
LanguageData.Mizu_Nursed.label: nursed
